title: Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai Manga
description:
This oneshot is part of the well-known series of doujins by the same artist called "Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai Hon", featuring cute and/or sexy girls showing you their panties while looking at you with disgust.

Artist's Twitter: [url]https://twitter.com/40hara[/url]
Artist's Pixiv: [url]https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=554102[/url]
